body_html: According to the documentation, y is supposed to be 1 or -1 to indicate whether the two vectors are supposed to be similar or not. Why are you creating a distribution of y instead? Shouldn't you pass a tensor containing only 1's and -1's?

body: According to the documentation, y is supposed to be 1 or -1 to indicate whether the two vectors are supposed to be similar or not. Why are you creating a distribution of y instead? Shouldn't you pass a tensor containing only 1's and -1's?
